## Welcome

This is your first scrollytelling story. Edit `src/lib/stories/my-first-story/data/copy.json` to change this content.

## Add Visualizations

Replace the placeholder in `Index.svelte` with your D3 or svelteplot visualization.

The `scrollIndex` variable tracks which step is in view.

## Customize Styles

Edit `src/styles/app.css` to override the default `--scrolly-*` CSS variables for your brand.

## Publish

Run `npm run build` to generate a static site ready for deployment on GitHub Pages, Vercel, or Netlify.
